locations.name: Front Campus
locations.brief_description: LOCATION 1 - You are at Front Campus.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 1 - Front Campus

You wake up on Front Campus. You need to find your USB drive, laptop charger, and lucky mug. Deposit them at Oak House before 1pm!

You can only carry 2 items at a time.

You can go east or south.

locations.name: University College
locations.brief_description: LOCATION 2 - You are at University College.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 2 - University College

You are at University College. A construction wall blocks the east.

You can go west or south.

This building is the oldest building on campus, built in 1853.

locations.name: Second Cup
locations.brief_description: LOCATION 4 - You are at Second Cup.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 4 - Second Cup

You are at Second Cup. You see your T-card and lucky mug on a table!

You can go south.

This place is a popular spot for students to grab coffee and study.

locations.name: McLennan Labs
locations.brief_description: LOCATION 5 - You are at McLennan Labs.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 5 - McLennan Labs

You are outside McLennan Physical Laboratories.

You can go north or south.

You are taking MAT137 lecture in this building.

locations.name: Woodsworth College
locations.brief_description: LOCATION 8 - You are at Woodsworth College.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 8 - Woodsworth College

You are walking through Woodsworth College.

You can go north, south, or west.

locations.name: Trinity College
locations.brief_description: LOCATION 9 - You are at Trinity College.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 9 - Trinity College

You are in the courtyard of Trinity College.

You can go north, east, or south.

This college is known for its beautiful architecture and rich history.

locations.name: New College
locations.brief_description: LOCATION 10 - You are at New College.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 10 - New College

You are near New College.

You can go west, east, or south.

The common space looks like a cozy place to study and relax.

locations.name: Bahen Centre
locations.brief_description: LOCATION 11 - You are at the Bahen Centre.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 11 - Bahen Centre

You are at the Bahen Centre. Your USB drive and laptop charger are here!

You can go west, east, or south.

This building is for CS students. You are taking CSC111 tutorial in this building.

locations.name: Earth Sciences Centre
locations.brief_description: LOCATION 12 - You are at the Earth Sciences Centre.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 12 - Earth Sciences Centre

You are at the Earth Sciences Centre.

You can go west, north, or south.

locations.name: Robarts Library
locations.brief_description: LOCATION 13 - You are at Robarts Library.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 13 - Robarts Library (LOCKED)

You are at Robarts Library. You need T-card to enter!

There is a Dorm Key.

You can go north or east.

This library is the biggest library in Canada.

locations.name: Sidney Smith Hall
locations.brief_description: LOCATION 14 - You are at Sidney Smith Hall.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 14 - Sidney Smith Hall

You are at Sidney Smith Hall.

You can go north, west, or east.

You are taking MAT137 tutorial in this building.

locations.name: Oak House
locations.brief_description: LOCATION 15 - You are at Oak House.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 15 - Oak House (LOCKED)

You are at Oak House! You need Dorm Key to enter!

DEPOSIT all 3 items here to win:
- USB Drive
- Laptop Charger
- Lucky Mug

You can go west, east, or north.

This is you residence building.

locations.name: Athletic Centre
locations.brief_description: LOCATION 16 - You are at the Athletic Centre.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 16 - Athletic Centre

You are at the Athletic Centre.

You can go west or north.

Lots of students are working out here!

items.name: USB Drive
items.description: A silver USB drive with all your project files.

items.name: Laptop Charger
items.description: Your laptop charger. Your battery is almost dead.

items.name: Lucky Mug
items.description: Your lucky U of T mug.

items.name: T-card
items.description: Your student ID card. Required to enter Robarts Library.

items.name: Dorm Key
items.description: A key to Oak House residence.
